title: MD
biography: This article documents the chronology and epidemiology of SARS-CoV-2 in January 2020, the virus which causes the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and is responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic. The first human cases of COVID-19 were identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019.
aiSummary: Jiang Rongmeng Beijing Children’s Hospital is a national clinical excellence award specialist with an H-index of 2 at Pediatrics (Member). Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
